goals__remit: Representing the interests of the car rental and car sharing industry and raising awareness of the industry and the role this sector has to play in the wider mobility landscape.  Currently focussing on the cross border car registraion proposal, consumer protection, mobility and connected car, changes to the union customs code and the effect on the industry and insurance distribution.
